long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This free plugin can help you easily download private videos and pictures from Telegram groups and channels. It is simple to operate and allows you to easily obtain media content.

Free Download telegram story - Download Telegram Videos, Images
The Telegram Downloader is a powerful tool that helps users easily download audio, video, story ,and images from Telegram to their computers. With our plugin, you can freely save various content for personal or academic use. We recommend that users do not download copyrighted content without permission.

ğŸ’¥ Key Features 
â˜‘ï¸  Free to Use:
Easily select multiple files or download a single resource with one click, making the download process quick and smooth.

â˜‘ï¸ Easily Download 1G+ Content

â˜‘ï¸ Wide Format Support:
Download multiple media formats, including videos, images, photos, GIFs, music, and audiobooks, all in one convenient tool.

â˜‘ï¸ Save Content from Restricted Channels and Groups:
Easily save audio and video files from restricted Telegram channels and groups directly to your local computer, ensuring you have access to all your favorite content.

â˜‘ï¸ Extract Private Content:
Securely save audio and video from private channels and personal shares.

â˜‘ï¸ Privacy Protection
No data collection, no password required, ensuring your privacy and security.

ğŸ‘‰ğŸ»Simple and easy steps:
1) Install the video download plug-in: and pin it in your browser.
2) Log in to Telegram web version: access your account.
3) Click to download: Click the icon in the upper right corner of the video or picture to download immediately.

ğŸ“ Disclaimer:
This plugin is not directly associated with the official Telegram application/website, but is independently developed by a third party. Please use it responsibly and respect copyright.
